welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Woodhaven, USA! Experience the charm of our quaint city known for its beautiful parks, bustling downtown area, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Woodhaven has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The McNamara Terminal is the largest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport is the newest terminal, serving primarily low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the main hub for all domestic and international flights at Willow Run Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments at Willow Run Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves smaller aircraft and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Detroit City Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights and offers services such as fueling, maintenance, and pilot lounges.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
